item.title: Parallel Series
item.author: Author
item.description: Prologue There are news in each .NET framework version and each one of us fall in love with -at lest- one of these. It happened to me with Generics in version 2.0, extension methods in version 3.0 and LINQ in version 3.5. Now with version 4.0 it’s time to fall in love again, this time with the Task Parallel Library. When I got the first preview, one of the first things I did was to learn about that new Task Parallel Library.
